bibl.title: The Cousin of Aiolos Hippotades (Stesichorus (?), P. Oxy. 3876 = Ineditorum Stesichoreorum fr. 62 Davies).
bibl.note: Reproduit de: H.L.-J., The Cousin of Aiolos Hippotades (Stesichorus (?), P. Oxy. 3876, Fr. 62), ZPE 87 (1991) pp. 297-300; - M.W.H., Aiolos' Cousin, ZPE 88 (1991) pp. 297-299; - H.L.-J., Odysseus' Cousin: A Reply to Professor Haslam (ZPE 88, 1991, 297 ff.).
